name: [Proto] Fortress Assault
description:
"Fortress Assault" is a physics based catapult shooter, it's a prototype so there are many things to improve but still wanted to put it out there.

The goal of the game is to take down all the soldiers of the enemy team. Buildings can explode when their shield is hit by a projectile.

The medieval and vegetation assets are made by  KenneyNL, you can check out what he does here: http://kenney.nl/assets
